name: All Things In Murderation
description:
Cmpt 406 Final Project- A choice based murder mystery exploration game, where your choice determines who lives, dies and gets arrested.

How to play:

Walking around the mansion in order to collect clues and talk to the guests of the mansion. Pay careful attention to what you pick up and what you say, as the consequences could lead to someones murder.

Controls:

WASD to walk

E to Interact/Pick Up/ Talk
